pkgmetadata.longdescription: Reliability Diagrams Using Isotonic Regression // Checking the reliability of predictions via the CORP approach, which generates provably statistically 'C'onsistent, 'O'ptimally binned, and 'R'eproducible reliability diagrams using the 'P'ool-adjacent-violators algorithm. See Dimitriadis, Gneiting, Jordan (2021) doi:10.1073/pnas.2016191118.
